      • nextStepTowards

        public static Vector nextStepTowards(Vector loc,
                                     Vector target,
                                     double length)
        Generates the unit vector of the vector between the first circle and the target and adds it to the location of the first vector
        Parameters:
        loc - The Location of the first Vector
        target - The Location of the Target
        length - The length of the next Step / the Speed of the Circle
        Returns:
        The Unitvector between those two locations
